message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! I think you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1,200,000.
Alice, thanks for the offer, but that price is a bit high for me.  I'd be willing to pay $600,000.

I understand you think the price is a bit high, but I'm not willing to go as low as $600,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer it to you for $900,000. This is my final offer, so I hope you'll consider it.
